org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend

Class RecommendEvalTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend.RecommendEvalTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EvalTask

    public class RecommendEvalTask
extends Object
implements EvalTask

    An eval task that attempts to recommend items for a test user.
